title: Hostel
occurrences: In the college hostel we have CCTV cameras in every corner
I've got scot-free even there This run-down hostel is a cakewalk.
Let this be a run-down hostel the way you describe it.
Whether I'm in the border or in the hostel.
'St Xavier's Hostel'
He is missing from hostel I'll pay you as soon as he's back
'Come back to the hostel We'll hatch some plan'
You have to take me into your hostel tonight.
You have to take me into your hostel.
That isn't a coffee shop It's a boys' hostel.
Why go to a boys' hostel?
Why don't I come to your hostel?!
You think you can find anyone more gutsy than me in my hostel?
Is it a problem for you to keep it in your hostel?
An entire block in our college hostel collapsed.
Listen, I handle 100 boys in the hostel on a daily basis.
In our hostel?
The entire hostel knows your weakness is the 'girl in the shower' scene, dude.
Clear out now Get out of the hostel.
Some fellow has hustled a girl into our hostel.
I saw a girl in our hostel.
Father is not running a hostel but a brothel!
Sathappan swears he saw a girl in this hostel.
In our hostel, Father?
A girl in the hostel under Father Kuriakose?!
- Our entire hostel knows. - Shut up.
Were you the one roaming around this hostel?
I'll send you to a hospital from our hostel.
No one can see this image in our entire hostel.
- To enter the hostel, da. - What is her job in a boys' hostel?
Did you really come into our hostel just for fun?
- This is our hostel. - What about that?
I meant the plan of our hostel.
'Parvin lived with her family in the building which is your hostel now'
This is a common feature in our hostel life.
No one in our hostel has thought of this idea.
Hostel or Vandaloor zoo?!
Can a girl or ghost step into our hostel defying your hawk eyes?
Shall we just check inside the boys' hostel, boss?
'Moron, he wanted to go into the hostel to look for your daughter'
Hey! Let's set fire to the hostel.
Let us shift our hostel to some other place, Father.
Father, we have to drive out the ghost haunting our hostel.
There is a deadly demoness spirit roaming around our hostel.
We are driving her out of our hostel tonight.
She's in the boys' hostel disguised in a 'purdah'
My daughter is in the Boys' hostel it seems
There's a real ghost in this hostel.
Didn't I do the same in your hostel?
